active.label: Active
active.title: Active Skill: Kraken's Deterrence
active.description:
• Kraken will fly towards the enemy and ensnare a large number of enemy troops, dealing damage and stunning them, as well as providing himself with a powerful amor bonus.
• Range: 8-9

passive.label: Passive
passive.title: Passive Skill: Frozen Tornado
passive.description:
• At the beginning of the battle, an Arctic tornado appears with the Kraken. Moving randomly, it causes continuous damage and slows enemies it touches. After several hits, enemy will be frozen.
• Range: 5

legendary.label: Legendary
legendary.title: Legendary Skill: Death Tentacle
legendary.description:
• Kraken stretches out multiple tentacles toward the enemy, dealing damage and causing stun effects.
• Number of Tentacles: 10 / 10 / 12 / 12 / 14 / 14 (14/14/14) / 14 (14/14/14) / 14
• Range: 2.6
